title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, they are displayed in different formats in dynamic text items and data/text items. The format of the datetime value in the dynamic text item does not match the format in the data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Insert a text, data, dynamic text item.
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
